subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: David Wright has set career Mets marks this year for runs batted in, runs, walks and strikeouts and is approaching Ed Kranepool’s hits total of 1,418.
snippet: David Wright has set career Mets marks this year for runs batted in, runs, walks and strikeouts and is approaching Ed Kranepool’s hits total of 1,418.
